# PBI #8: Add Settings Toggle for Tag Suggestions

**Priority:** Medium  
**Story Points:** 3  
**Labels:** `enhancement`, `settings`, `ui`

## Description
Add a user setting to enable/disable the tag suggestions feature.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] New setting in DataStore for tag suggestions enabled/disabled
- [ ] Setting displayed in Settings screen
- [ ] Default value is `true` (enabled)
- [ ] Use cases check setting before generating
- [ ] Setting persists across app restarts
- [ ] UI shows device compatibility status

## Dependencies
- Depends on PBI #4

See TAG_SUGGESTIONS_IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN.md for full details.
